name: Healing Wave
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Healing magic extends from you to a target creature within range that you can see, healing 3d6 hit points, plus an additional amount equal to your spellcasting stat.

For every AP spent on this spell past the first, you can choose an additional target to receive healing. Each additional target receives 1d6 less healing than the last target.
empower: Heals 4d10 hit points plus your spellcasting stat instead and can bounce to an additional target. Each additional target reduces the healing by 1d10.
